title: SCP-6500 Fragment 1
content:

overwatch=a|
dark=a|
wide=a|
hidetitle=a]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:fade-in speed=1]]

[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Courgette&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:ital,wght@0,800;1,800&display=swap');

:root {
    --head-font: 'Monserrat', sans-serif;
}

:is(.fancyborder) {
  border-radius: 4vb;
}
[[/module]]

[[html]]
<audio autoplay>
  <source src="https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Ascp-6500-1/Collapse%20-%20myuu.mp3" type="audio/mp3">
</audio>
[[/html]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="background: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Ascp-6500-1/OverwatchBack.svg) center no-repeat; text-align: center; width: 575px; margin: 0 auto; font-size: 20px; padding: 0px;"]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

++* ##gold|BY ORDER OF OVERWATCH COMMAND##
##gold|This file has been cleared for access by all personnel. Readers are compelled to consume the following Sacrament.##

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="default-col"]]
[[span class="round" style="font-size: 150%; background: var(--dark-bg-1); border: 8px solid var(--dark-bg-1); font-family: var(--ui-font);"]]
[[collapsible show="» COMMENCE RITUAL «" hide="« SIXTH SUN'S REFRAIN »"]]
[[/span]]

@@ @@

[[div class="fancyborder" style="background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-5862/paperbackground.jpg); color: var(--dark-bg-1); font-size: 150%; font-weight: bold; font-family: 'Courgette'; font-style: italic; max-width: 700px; margin: auto;"]]

@@ @@

I am the blade, I am the shield
I am the arm that shall not yield
In tempest I stand fast
A legend, I will last

I will not fade

I am the wand, I am the flame
I am the rod for truths untamed
In knowledge I will trust
Invoked, I burn the dust

I will not fade

I am the knife, I am the shade
I am the hunter, not the prey
In whispers I have tread
By infamy, I spread

I will not fade

I am the rite, I am the scales
I am the patience which prevails
In honour I abide
With faith, I turn the tide

I will not fade

We the sentries, we the wall
We the final card to fall
Through toil, we shall gain
Through blood, we shall remain

We will not fail

@@ @@

[[/div]]

@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@

[[div style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 200%;"]]
{{You are now protected;}}

{{[/scp-6500/offset/3 Stay fast, and proceed.]}}
[[/div]]

[[span]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/span]]
